name: Sempervivum Calcareum
description: A tough, beautiful rosette-shaped succulent with green leaves and reddish tips. Perfect for sunny spots and easy to care for.

name: Ice Plant
description: A playful succulent with chunky leaves. Easy to grow and perfect for bright, sunny spots.

name: Moonstones
description: A cute succulent with round, soft purple leaves. Soft to the touch and ideal for small indoor planters.

name: String of Pearls
description: Trailing succulent with pearl-like leaves that hang like a necklace. Great for hanging baskets and unique displays.
